Articles.Content:
The game crashed when I tried to launch this ship and now always crashes when I try to load it in the VAB even after removing all mods

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B-kaKmJuK7aHLXkxTkdqQnVkNEU/view?usp=sharing

could somebody please try the file and see if it works for them, it contains no modded parts

EDIT: seems to be a mint thing, if somebody could remove the bottom stage(the last edited part) and send it back that would help my missions greatly

Edited June 26, 2015 by Chrozayis
